EmailTemplate.description: Program Manager not accepted the Amendment then email sent to Program Owner
EmailTemplate.name: Program Amendment Send back to Owner Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Program #{!Program__c.Name} Amendment has sent back to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Program__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you that the amendments are not accepted for the Program #{!Program__c.Name} and has sent back to you. Kindly login to the EGMS Systems and click here to view program details,
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
